title: jordanw21
author: jordanw21
content: So I'm a big fan of the Plinko game. I like Plinko because:1) It works better than provably fair blackjack for me - in Stake, I had an experience where I lost 6 times in a row. 2) In Plinko, it's much easier to double up little sums and you always have a chance for a big win.I found an algorithm with same chances as most provably fair Plinkos have, so I launched a website to make it convenient to see my luck before playing with actual money. Website adress:BITCOINPLINKO.COMIf someone else want to try, please note that it requires Gmail (so don't use with your real name)!So there are options to change lines, bet size. Each time when your balance below 10, you can replenish it.In one day, I'll add affiliate or sell single link there to pay coder in order to change Google Auth to smth else and add high volatility mode.

comments.author: iv4n
comments.body: I like Plinko, it's a good game for wagering a lot in a short period of time, and with a bit of luck with some little profit. But as with any other lucky-based game, it can be really hard to survive some long-losing streaks, so I can't agree that it's easier to double your amount with Plinko. And I don't like simulators, so why would we play Plinko for free? Where is the excitement?

comments.author: so98nn
comments.body: Ah I love this game too. I started with this game on Roobet and also got very addicted after watching YouTube shorts associated with it. One streamer was very crazy with this game and he used to play only Plinko and no other game at all while streaming. He made huge money with it and also was able to hit the jackpot multipliers like 250-500x. Since in the Plinko you have equal distribution on the edges it has two 250x and 500x and there is double chance of hitting the highest multipliers.  That’s what I like the most about this game. The stimulation game is really nice. I think you should really turn this into paid one to make it more competitive experience. You already have the great UI, better turn it into a business venture.
